class_notes:
LING 498 Spectrogram Reading 
We will meet for an hour every week online to read and discuss spectrograms! You need to have a basic understanding of phonetics.


Prerequisites: LING 210 or any language focused phonetics class such as French phonetics or Spanish phonetics.
course_description:
Students study, read, and write on a topic under the direction or supervision of a faculty
member. Permission of the department and a supervising faculty member is required.
sections: Class Nbr: 5460, Section #: 2, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11a-12p, Instructor: Y. Kim, Status: Open
